Text:
Updated and expanded Akkadian, Hebrew and Classical Syriac learning packs are available here
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6344941/25_Language_Learning_Packs_Collection

Learning materials for Arabic, Ethiopic and other Afro-Asiatic languages (Somali,Hausa,Coptic) will be included in the torrent Language Learning Packs Collection Volume 2, to be released next week.
